function.name: focus
function.description: This browser function sets or unset the focus to the node element. Set focus to true to give the element focus, false to release the focus. This is used as a replacement for mouseover and mouseout events in the absence of a mouse. Some pages require these events to be triggered to load data for combo-boxes, menus or other dynamic elements.
